Name: Jack-in-the-Box
Ingredients: 60 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Smooth 'n' easy pineapple laced with apple brandy. If you like this, then you may also like French Martinis
Nutrition: One serving of Jack-in-the-Box contains 179 calories
